name: Expeerience
overview:
Want to see what’s going on around you? Or in the world?

Expeerience™ ties together photos and videos captured at different social events, including sports games, concerts, activities, nightclubs, bars, etc into different moments in time, allowing you to discover and experience events going on both locally and globally as if you were actually there in person.

Take photos and videos of your experiences and share them with the world so others can witness what you’re seeing from your perspective. Discover new photos and videos posted by others during those same moments and add them to your collections to expand your memories of those experiences.

Follow others to see their latest posts, and share any photo or video directly to your followers with the flick of a finger.

Features

- Try the app without signing up!
- Login with Facebook or Twitter
- Photos and Videos
- Suggested Tags
- “Flick It” - A photo/video direct message!
- Local/Global Setting
- Instant sharing to Facebook and Twitter
- Like, collect, and comment on posts
- In-app notifications
